name: v6-idea4rc-analytics
description: This algorithm computes summary statistics for a set of cohorts

functions.name: summary

arguments.name: columns
arguments.description: List of columns to compute the summary statistics for

arguments.name: numeric_columns
arguments.description: List of numeric columns to compute the summary statistics for

arguments.name: organizations_to_include
arguments.description: The organizations to include in the task. If not given, all organizations in the collaboration are included.

functions.description: Compute summary statistics for a set of cohorts

databases.description: The cohorts to compute the summary statistics for
databases.name: cohorts

functions.name: crosstab

arguments.name: results_col
arguments.description: The column to compute the crosstab statistics for

arguments.name: group_cols
arguments.description: The columns to group the data by

arguments.name: organizations_to_include
arguments.description: The organizations to include in the task. If not given, all organizations in the collaboration are included.

arguments.name: include_chi2
arguments.description: Whether to include the results of a chi-squared statistic test in the results or not. By default, it is included.

arguments.name: include_totals
arguments.description: Whether to include the sums of the rows and columns or not. By default, they are included.

functions.description: Compute crosstab statistics for a set of cohorts

databases.description: The cohorts to compute the crosstab statistics for
databases.name: cohorts
